@FireWomon @BBCTheArchers @BBCRadio4 I'm guessing you haven't been listening to #Thearchers and have just decided to have a pop based on little or no knowledge of how the storyline has been written. Sunday to Friday at 19:00 or Sunday 10:00. Feel free to listen before judging.

Yes, the wedding was great but #Marr is meant to be a political programme and I honestly don't believe the wedding of two people will change the world.
